career.name: Titanium Industrial Security S.L.
career.title: Junior Software Developer
description: Developed RESTful APIs with C#, .NET, and Entity Framework, supporting advanced queries with OData.
Implemented Keycloak for secure and scalable authentication and authorization.
Managed events with Kafka to synchronize distributed systems.
Participated in the transition from a monolithic architecture to microservices, ensuring modularity and scalability.
Processed and analyzed data using Apache Kafka and Elasticsearch.

career.name: Titanium Industrial Security S.L.
career.title: Intern Developer
description: Migrated an enterprise application from .NET 6 to .NET 8, improving stability, performance, and compatibility.
Designed and optimized SQL databases in PostgreSQL to enhance performance and scalability.
